name: Plague Your Neighbour
description:
This is a two player PVP neighbourhood battle: Who will win the Beauty-Garden-Award when the last rain drop fell?

Evaluation The Judges of the Beauty-Garden-Award will rate your garden this way:

Every single flower: +1 

Every  two flowers of the same type side by side: +2 (Consider three flowers of the same type in a row offer you this point twice!)

Every flower field with an alternating pattern: +14 (Flower A - Flower B - Flower A - Flower B)

Examples: 3 Flowers = 3 Points

2 Flowers + 1 Pair = 4 Points

4 Flowers + 3 Pairs = 10 Points

4 Flowers + Pattern = 18 Points

Controls

Please try out the Controler Gameplay. If you do not have at least one controler you can also use the following keys:

Player Left (Panther): 

Movement: W, A, S, D
Switch item: Q, E
Use item: F
Switch to umbrella: R

Player Right (Koala):

Movement: Arrow Keys
Switch tem: Backslash, Shift Right
Use item: Control Right
Switch to umbrella: Dot

Godot Wild Jam #18: Plague

This game is made for all wild cards (but the golden):

Okay, in fact, I realised Pixel-Graphics is not implicitly 1980s media style. This game probably would not have worked on the devices at then - so let's say this is more a "late 80s"-Game. 😉
